trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of child controls in a table layout container.
trans-unit.target: Representa una colección de controles secundarios en un contenedor de diseño de tabla.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class represents the collection of all the child controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> clase representa la colección de todos los controles secundarios en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.

trans-unit.source: This collection is exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta colección se expone mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> clase.

trans-unit.source: You can manage and individually manipulate members of the table layout panel through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> exposed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Puede administrar y manipular individualmente miembros del panel de diseño de tabla a través de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> expuestos por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class is a minor specialization of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> base class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> clase es una especialización secundaria de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> clase base.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control that contains the control collection.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> que contiene la colección de controles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Generally, the application programmer will not directly create instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Por lo general, el programador de aplicaciones no creará directamente instancias de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> clase.

trans-unit.source: Instead, a reference to an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, una referencia a un archivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> devuelto por la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The control to add.
trans-unit.target: Control que se va a agregar.

trans-unit.source: The column in which <c>control</c> will be placed.
trans-unit.target: Columna en la que se colocará <c>control</c>.

trans-unit.source: The row in which <c>control</c> will be placed.
trans-unit.target: Fila en la que se colocará <c>control</c>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified control to the collection and positions it at the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Agrega el control especificado a la colección y lo coloca en la celda especificada.

trans-unit.source: With <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.Add%2A>, you can specify the cell position of `control`.
trans-unit.target: Con <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.Add%2A>, puede especificar la posición de la celda de `control`.

trans-unit.source: You can assign `control` to a specific cell by providing both the `column` and `row` parameters, or you can specify only the column or row value and let the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> place `control` at the next open cell.
trans-unit.target: Puede asignar `control` a una celda concreta proporcionando tanto la `column` y `row` parámetros, o bien puede especificar solo el valor de columna o fila y dejar que el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> colocar `control` en la siguiente celda abierta.

trans-unit.source: This is known as letting the control *flow* to its position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Esto se conoce como permitir que el control *flujo* en su posición en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.

trans-unit.source: Set `column` to -1 if you want `control` to occupy a fixed row position.
trans-unit.target: Establecer `column` en -1 si desea que `control` para ocupar una posición de fila fijo.

trans-unit.source: Set `row` to -1 if you want `control` to occupy a fixed column position.
trans-unit.target: Establecer `row` en -1 si desea que `control` para ocupar la posición de una columna fija.

trans-unit.source: If neither `column` nor `row` is -1, `control` will be added at the absolute position given by (`column`, `row`).
trans-unit.target: Si no `column` ni `row` es -1, `control` se agregará en la posición absoluta especificada por (`column`, `row`).

trans-unit.source: If you set both `column` and `row` to -1, `control` will flow to the first open position, with the specific flow behavior defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: Si establece ambos `column` y `row` en -1, `control` fluirá a la primera posición abierta, con el comportamiento de flujo específico definido por el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> valor.

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Esto equivale a utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: To get to the actual current position of a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para llegar a la posición actual real de un control, utilice la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control state, including column or row spanning and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Este método tiene en cuenta toda la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> estado del control, incluida la columna o fila de expansión y cuándo el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ha colocado un control con su `Column` y `Row` se establecen en -1.

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="column" /> or <paramref name="row" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="column" /> o <paramref name="row" /> es menor que -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> that contains the controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> primario que contiene los controles de la colección.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> that contains the controls in the current collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> que contiene los controles de la colección actual.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se establece el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
